hero.desc: Your trusted travel agency for tours, snorkeling, and more.

home.aboutBody: CIDIKA TRAVEL&TOUR focuses on Nusa Penida experiences: land tours, snorkeling, and stay packages. We combine comfort, warmth, and professionalism. Booking is easy via Email, Instagram, WhatsApp, or phone—transparent and secure.
home.point1: Complete packages: One Day, Half Day, 1D1N + Snorkeling, 2D1N.
home.point2: Local guides who can help with photos.
home.point3: Private tours—flexible schedule, no shared groups.
home.point4: Clear pricing including round-trip fast boat and entrance fees.
home.banner1: Iconic spots—Kelingking, Diamond, Crystal Bay—in one trip.
home.how1d: Check details & itinerary that match your needs.
home.how2d: Confirm the dates—we'll check availability quickly.
home.how3d: Enjoy the trip—let us handle logistics and comfort.
home.ctaDesc: Reach us via WhatsApp/Instagram/Email. We'll tailor the best itinerary for your time & budget.
